nodes.text: The 9PS, also known as the "Gundark Fist" 9PS, was a scattergun produced by Speizoc Arms during the Cold War. Weighing 2.75 kilograms with a barrel of 400 millimeters and a rancor-hide stock grip, the gun carried 50 plasma shells and had an effective range of 10 meters but a maximum range of 35 meters.
